TopicTitle: C-11 Private light plane and Ca-11 Trainer

Articles.Content:
Civilian Aircraft Industrys presents the new C-11 Light aircraft and Ca-11 Basic Trainer and Bush plane.

The C-11 is a basic civilian light plane for the common house folk.

The Ca-11 is on the other hand a go anywhere- do anything plane equipped with Pontoons for water landings it is also a training aircraft for air-forces needing a cheap multi-purpose training aircraft. All C-11\'s are equiped with emergancy parachutes.

All Nations Wanting leave country name purpose of use and how many have been ordered

Needs KSP 0.14 and up, Dammed Aerospace, C7 plane parts and HSTW\'s Pontoons and ski/skids and the raidial parachute .
